title: Can depression and autism go hand in hand? - Quora

response.answer_text: It's not that autism and depression go together many times, it's that autism usually gives us struggles which may be super easy for NT (non autistics), you may feel left out, bullied and much more, and this, consequently may cause depression for those who have Autism. To sum up: autistic people are likely to suffer depression because of the struggles they go through.
